title: Procurement of 02 Nos. of Digital Fluroscopy Machines used to investigate Diseases in Blood Vessels
decision_details: - The proposal made by Hon. (Dr.) Rajitha Senaratne, the Minister of Health, Nutrition & Indigenous Medicine to award the contract for the procurement of 02 Digital Fluroscopy Machines used in taking Digital Subtraction Angiography (DSA) images in the investigations carried out to diagnose diseases in blood vessels in the various body organs including the brain and the heart  to M/s Dimo (Pvt.) Ltd., for a sum of US$ 1.1 million, as recommended by the Standing Cabinet Appointed Procurement Committee and the Procurement Appeal Board and to award service and maintenance contract of those machines for a sum of Rs 35.8 million, for a further period of 05 years after the expiry of a two year warranty period, was approved by the Cabinet.
